title: Ling Yu - Spirit Realm S3
alternative_title: Spiritual Domain Third Season, Spiritual Field 3, 灵域 第三季
description: Di San Ji – Qin Lie has pulled up twelve spiritual columns, but the war between the Evil Clan and many tribues is imminent. However, at the most critical moment, the appearance of Li Mu in Tianjian Mountain prevented things from going in the worst direction.
